title: Alan Watt - Cutting Through The Matrix - week 26, 2008
description:
CUTTING THROUGH the MATRIX with ALAN WATT


(( ( Commercial Free ) )) ... ID3v2 Tagged ...



In all ages, in all lands, there have been those who seek truth. This seeking
is an individual&#039;s search for something more than self, and much more than the
confines of this worldly system. It is the seeker, who understands there is more
than what meets the eye, who is not afraid and makes the choice to go into the
unknown. The process of awaking has begun, the discovery is underway.

2008 - Alan Watt - A Course in Deprogramming



Alan Watt, a leading researcher into hidden history, ancient civilizations,
and their influence on modern society, speaks on the global agenda of the
ruling elite, the open conspiracy, the old world order made new, the temporary
police state leading to the chip implant, and much more.

Alan Watt&#039;s interviews on CuttingThroughTheMatrix are absolutely priceless.
His broadcasts are in a class of their own. In a world full of clones, his powerfully
original presentation and unique message undoubtedly makes him a target.
 <a href="
http://www.cuttingthroughthematrix.com/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.cuttingthroughthematrix.com/</a>



This Week: week 26, 2008

1. June232008 - LIVEonRBN 131 - LIBERTY FRATERNITY EQUALITY.

  "Are You Fat, a Heavy Breather,
   Tall or Squat, a Tiny Geezer?
   Geneticists and Officials, with Half-Truths and Lies,
   Are Out to Have You Standardized,
   It&#039;ll be Done for You, No Need to Beg,
   By Removing Defective Genes from Egg,
   Yes, One Day, We&#039;ll All Look the Same,
   Praising Test Tube Obelisks whence We Came,
   And the Silicone Womb that is Our Mother,
   We Borg can Truly Call, Each Other, &#039;Brother&#039; "


2. June252008 - LIVEonRBN 132 - They&#039;re Charging a Boy  It&#039;s Enough to Faze Ya.

  "They&#039;re Charging a Boy, It&#039;s Enough to Faze Ya,
   Twelve-Year-Old, Blue-Eyed, and He Loves Al-Qaeda,
   Likes Guns and Sex, Into Sadomasochism,
   Sir Bettison says &#039;It could land him in prison&#039;,
   Had a Diet of Video Games from Movie Industry,
   Could Make Bombs if He&#039;s Good at Chemistry,
   Sir Bettison should Rather than Chastise Him,
   View His Positive Qualities, Turn Round and Hire Him,
   With Some Gentle Coaching, He&#039;d be Willing to Please,
   Good Torturers for the Military don&#039;t Grow on Trees"


3. June272008 - LIVEonRBN 133 - Food is a Weapon Say the Ancient of Sages
   Used Over and Over Down through the Ages.

  "Food is a Weapon, Say the Ancient of Sages,
   Used Over and Over Down through the Ages,
   Weather Warfare and Food Cartels are Working Today,
   To Bring Famine and Riots to the Old USA,
   And as This Agenda is Gradually Unfurled,
   Starvation will come, Across the Whole World"
